question: How can I contact customer care?
answer: You can send us a message on whatsapp +234 (0) 802 511 6306 or send an email to hello@cashingames.com

question: How can I win on Cashingames?
answer: There are multiple ways to win on Cashingames! Staking : You can stake cash before playing a game session and stand a chance to earn the winnings on the staking table depending on your score! Live Trivia : You can participate in our weekly live trivias and win amazing cash prizes if you emerge as one of the top 3! Leaderboard: Earn exciting cash prizes (6 figures!) monthly when you play daily and climb up the leaderboard.

question: Why should I refer my friends to play and is it a must?
answer: Referring your friends to Cashingames helps them make money too and besides what are friends for?. It is not a must to refer your friends but you receive a bonus upon successful referral.

question: How much can I win? (Is there a limit to it?)
answer: There are absolutely no limits! The higher your stake, the higher your chances of earning cool winnings.

question: Can I play all day?
answer: Yes, you can. The world of trivia on Cashingames is open to you 24 hrs 7 days a week.

question: I don’t have a Cashingames account. Do I need one?
answer: Yes, you need one so you can be eligible to play and also withdraw your winnings.

question: How quickly am I paid when I win on Cashingames?
answer: You receive your cash prizes after 24 hours of winning.

question: How can I send in my questions or suggestions?
answer: You can send in your questions via our email to hello@cashingames.com

question: What is the minimum amount I can withdraw from my winnings?
answer: The minimum amount you can withdraw for now is ₦500.00

question: Can I withdraw my signup bonus?
answer: No, you cannot withdraw your sign up bonus because it is required to explore other features on Cashingames.

question: How will I fund my wallet?
answer: You can fund your wallet by clicking the “fund” tab in your wallet.

question: Why should I link my Bank account to Cashingames?
answer: This is important so you will be able to withdraw your cash prizes.
